name: Chernobyl Warzone
description:
-New Mutant Horde Mode: 1-4 Players - Destroy the radioactives mutants eggs and all enemies waves. 

-Multi 2-10 players Deathmatch FPS - Survival - 10 kills to win the game : Face other players on the radioactive nuclear zone of Chernobyl, explore the map to find new weapons and gather ammo. When radioactivity is increasing on the surface and the alert sounds you must go underground and fight in the city basements.

Free play on Core games : https://www.coregames.com/games/8f55ff/chernobyl-warzone
